source:
SELECT 
    TOP 100 *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'https://testgen2.dfs.core.chinacloudapi.cn/testparquet/new_retaillist_SeedCube_20231012.parquet',
    FORMAT='PARQUET'
) AS [result]

%%sql

create TABLE test10300 STORED as parquet  as SELECT * from default.test;
select * from test1030  where  new_report_李舒琴

%%sql

select * from default.test10300 where new_report = '李舒琴'

%%sql

CREATE TEMPORARY VIEW  test_detils AS  select * from default.test

%%sql

CREATE TABLE default.test010 Stored  as  parquet  as  select * from test_detils;

%%sql

CREATE TABLE default.test002 as select * from default.test;

%%sql

select new_isdocument,owningbusinessunit,count(*) from test002 GROUP BY new_isdocument,owningbusinessunit

%%sql

create table testtaxi2 as select* from default.testtaxi;

%%sql

CREATE TEMPORARY VIEW  test_taxidetils AS  select * from default.testtaxi;

%%pyspark
df = spark.read.load('abfss://testparquet@testgen2.dfs.core.chinacloudapi.cn/test.csv', format='csv'
## If header exists uncomment line below
##, header=True
)
df.write.mode("overwrite").saveAsTable("default.testcsv")

%%pyspark
df = spark.read.load('abfss://testparquet@testgen2.dfs.core.chinacloudapi.cn/test2.csv', format='csv'
## If header exists uncomment line below
##, header=True
)

df.write.parquet("abfss://testparquet@testgen2.dfs.core.chinacloudapi.cn/people.parquet")

%%scala

val df = spark.createDataFrame(Seq(
  (1100, "Person1", "Location1", null),
  (1200, "Person2", "Location2", "Contact2"),
  (1300, "Person3", "Location3", null),
  (1400, "Person4", null, "Contact4"),
  (1500, "Person5", "Location4", null)
)).toDF("id", "name", "location", "contact")

%%sql

CREATE TABLE testparquet as select * from default.test001;

%%sql

CREATE TEMPORARY VIEW  test_detils1024 AS  select * from default.test001;
